description: This file sets up a REST API server for managing personal notes using FastAPI. It defines endpoints for health checks, creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes. It also initializes the database schema and middleware configurations.

methods.name: health_check()
methods.description: Health check endpoint returning a simple message indicating the server is healthy.

methods.name: create_note(note: schemas.NoteCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates a new note using data from request body.

methods.name: list_notes(skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves a list of notes with pagination support.

methods.name: get_note(note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Fetches a specific note by its ID, raises 404 if not found.

methods.name: update_note(note_id: int, note: schemas.NoteUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Updates an existing note by its ID.

methods.name: delete_note(note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Deletes a note specified by its ID, returns the deleted note.

ctags.name: list_notes
ctags.pattern: /^def list_notes(skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/
ctags.signature: (skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100, db: Session = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: update_note
ctags.pattern: /^def update_note(note_id: int, note: schemas.NoteUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/
ctags.signature: (note_id: int, note: schemas.NoteUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
